languages.text: "В одних лишь робах, без брони, с цепным Потрошителем в руках, эти раз оступившиеся сестры совершают свое покаяние на поле битвы. Их век редко долог, но смерть во имя очищения — лучшая участь, чем жизнь с тенью в душе".

"Wearing nothing but robes, no armour, Eviscerator in hand, those sisters who have once faltered find repentance on the battlefield. Their lives are seldom long, but a death in the name of purgation is a better fate than to live with a shadow in one's soul."
languages.original_text: "В одних лишь робах, без брони, с цепным Потрошителем в руках, эти раз оступившиеся сестры совершают свое покаяние на поле битвы. Их век редко долог, но смерть во имя очищения — лучшая участь, чем жизнь с тенью в душе".

traits.locale_text: "Wearing nothing but robes, no armor, chainsword in hand, these Sisters who have once faltered find repentance on the battlefield. Their lives are seldom long, but a death in the name of purgation is a better fate than to live with a shadow in one's soul."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Wearing nothing but robes, no armour, Eviscerator in hand, those sisters who have once faltered find repentance on the battlefield. Their lives are seldom long, but a death in the name of purgation is a better fate than to live with a shadow in one's soul."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Wearing nothing but robes, no armour, Eviscerator in hand, those sisters who have once faltered find repentance on the battlefield. Their lives are seldom long, but a death in the name of purgation is a better fate than to live with a shadow in one's soul."

languages.text: «Ataviadas únicamente con su hábito, desprovistas de armadura y con el eviscerador en ristre, esas hermanas hacen penitencia por sus errores en el campo de batalla. No suelen vivir mucho, pero morir expiando los pecados es mucho mejor sino que vivir con el alma ensombrecida».
languages.original_text: "Wearing nothing but robes, no armour, Eviscerator in hand, those sisters who have once faltered find repentance on the battlefield. Their lives are seldom long, but a death in the name of purgation is a better fate than to live with a shadow in one's soul."

traits.locale_text: «Ataviadas únicamente con su hábito, desprovistas de armadura y con el eviscerador en ristre, esas hermanas hacen penitencia por sus errores en el campo de batalla. No suelen vivir mucho, pero morir expiando los pecados es mucho mejor sino que vivir con el alma ensombrecida».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「防具を身につけず法衣だけを身にまとい、エヴィサレイターを手に、一度は道を外した姉妹たちも戦場で悔い改める。彼女たちは短命だが、浄化という名の死は魂に影を残して生きるよりはましな運命だ」
languages.original_text: "Wearing nothing but robes, no armour, Eviscerator in hand, those sisters who have once faltered find repentance on the battlefield. Their lives are seldom long, but a death in the name of purgation is a better fate than to live with a shadow in one's soul."

traits.locale_text: 「防具を身につけず法衣だけを身にまとい、エヴィサレイターを手に、一度は道を外した姉妹たちも戦場で悔い改める。彼女たちは短命だが、浄化という名の死は魂に影を残して生きるよりはましな運命だ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “她们只穿长袍，不着盔甲，手里拿着开膛剑。那些姐妹曾在信仰的道路上踌躇不前，她们会在战场上找到救赎。尽管她们通常活不了多久，但以赎罪之名而死，总比带着阴影活着要好。”
languages.original_text: "Wearing nothing but robes, no armour, Eviscerator in hand, those sisters who have once faltered find repentance on the battlefield. Their lives are seldom long, but a death in the name of purgation is a better fate than to live with a shadow in one's soul."

traits.locale_text: “她们只穿长袍，不着盔甲，手里拿着开膛剑。那些姐妹曾在信仰的道路上踌躇不前，她们会在战场上找到救赎。尽管她们通常活不了多久，但以赎罪之名而死，总比带着阴影活着要好。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Vêtues uniquement de leurs robes et armées de leurs eviscerators, ces sœurs ayant jadis failli cherchent la rédemption sur le champ de bataille. Leurs vies sont rarement longues, mais une mort au nom de la purification est un sort plus enviable qu'une vie hantée par les ténèbres. »
languages.original_text: "Wearing nothing but robes, no armour, Eviscerator in hand, those sisters who have once faltered find repentance on the battlefield. Their lives are seldom long, but a death in the name of purgation is a better fate than to live with a shadow in one's soul."

traits.locale_text: « Vêtues uniquement de leurs robes et armées de leurs eviscerators, ces sœurs ayant jadis failli cherchent la rédemption sur le champ de bataille. Leurs vies sont rarement longues, mais une mort au nom de la purification est un sort plus enviable qu'une vie hantée par les ténèbres. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Schwestern, die einst ins Stolpern geraten sind, tun nun auf dem Schlachtfeld Buße. Sie tragen nur Roben, keine Rüstung, und sind mit einem Eviscerator bewaffnet. Ihre Leben sind selten lang, doch ein Tod im Name der Läuterung ist ein besseres Schicksal als ein Leben mit einem Schatten auf der Seele."
languages.original_text: "Wearing nothing but robes, no armour, Eviscerator in hand, those sisters who have once faltered find repentance on the battlefield. Their lives are seldom long, but a death in the name of purgation is a better fate than to live with a shadow in one's soul."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Schwestern, die einst ins Stolpern geraten sind, tun nun auf dem Schlachtfeld Buße. Sie tragen nur Roben, keine Rüstung, und sind mit einem Eviscerator bewaffnet. Ihre Leben sind selten lang, doch ein Tod im Name der Läuterung ist ein besseres Schicksal als ein Leben mit einem Schatten auf der Seele."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Tövbekâr Rahibeler; basit bir kıyafetten başka zırh giymez, Karındeşenleri ile muharebe meydanlarında hatalarını telafi etmeye çabalarlar. Ömürleri nadiren uzun olsa da arınma yolunda ölmek, kişinin ruhunda bir lekeyle yaşamasından yeğdir."
languages.original_text: "Wearing nothing but robes, no armour, Eviscerator in hand, those sisters who have once faltered find repentance on the battlefield. Their lives are seldom long, but a death in the name of purgation is a better fate than to live with a shadow in one's soul."

traits.locale_text: "Tövbekâr Rahibeler basit bir kıyafetten başka zırh giymez, Karındeşenleriyle muharebe meydanlarında hatalarını telafi etmeye çabalarlar. Ömürleri nadiren uzun olsa da arınma yolunda ölmek, kişinin ruhunda bir lekeyle yaşamasından yeğdir."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
